hey guys, I have kind of an idiosynchratic annoyance:
`julia-vim` now has highlighting of functions, but regardless of how one sets the color this makes data types, `!` characters and module names in function declarations the same color.  I don't really like this, I particularly want types to have type colors and modules not to have the smae color as functions.  Is there any way of either customizing this, or restoring the original behavior on latest commits?
